feed.title: YTPTube Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: master-20250615-4c76aa7
entry.content:
• 38dc9c1 spin the icon if the item is queued. by arabcoders
  • ffcae45 the ability to mark notification as low priority to bypass the toast by arabcoders
  • 784671c Fix premiere re-queue. by arabcoders
  • 367d4a1 Fixed bug in auth handler. by arabcoders

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: master-20250616-c07465a
entry.content:
• 249bb43 RSS feed support for youtube channel/playlist. by arabcoders
  • 4ee0a99 Add new service for dependency injection. by arabcoders
  • ba650fe minor changes by arabcoders
  • 1d8fc51 upgrade packages. by arabcoders
  • 3708734 minor status name changes by arabcoders

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.1.1
entry.content:
• 8694e82 minor design update by arabcoders
  • 0345da6 handle ping endpoint logging better by arabcoders
  • 888ab30 Allow task handler to work even if no timer is set. by arabcoders
  • f6c4424 make the task handler timer configurable by arabcoders
  • cf647cb Fix missing parameter by arabcoders
  • 20b0e41 update the tips on how to mark task as rss feed only. by arabcoders
  • 5065d4e fixed segments_stream redirection by arabcoders
  • 690ecf8 reduce youtube task handler logging by arabcoders
  • 872d85c add log entry when playlist processing is completed. by arabcoders
  • 8a3673b added playlist items concurrency support. by arabcoders
  • f507088 As we no longer need to update each time yt-dlp updates, we going to use simver by arabcoders
  • 6e05efb Merge pull request #304 from arabcoders/dev by Abdulmohsen

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.1.2
entry.content:
• 69de66c update docker hub read me on tag by arabcoders
  • 746b490 Added filter displayed items in tasks page. by arabcoders
  • 86da6c2 improve the import/export process to allow for non-ascii characters. by arabcoders
  • 44226c9 when item download fails, trigger item_error event by arabcoders
  • c3b2e25 For youtube handler, if item_error events received, remove the item from queued ids. by arabcoders
  • 4bf65f0 Merge pull request #305 from arabcoders/dev by Abdulmohsen

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.1.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improve tasks page for mass operations. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/ytptube/pull/306
  • Make it possible to view local item info by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/ytptube/pull/308
  • minor design update for index page. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/ytptube/pull/309
  • 47484c2 make datastore.get key optional. by arabcoders
  • c4b8bf5 Fix sio disconnect event by arabcoders
  • e02fedf Improve tasks page for mass operations. by arabcoders
  • e77ed11 fix by arabcoders
  • 8fe68f3 Merge pull request #306 from arabcoders/dev by Abdulmohsen
  • 875d488 add api/item/{id} endpoint by arabcoders
  • 7dca15a clean up item object by arabcoders
  • c8dbd93 make it possible to view local item info by arabcoders
  • 3f3f63f Merge pull request #308 from arabcoders/dev by Abdulmohsen
  • 291c465 improve task logging by arabcoders
  • a188c20 packages update by arabcoders
  • a2f5c77 minor design update for index page. by arabcoders
  • de4b88e Merge pull request #309 from arabcoders/dev by Abdulmohsen

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/ytptube/compare/v0.1.2...v0.1.3
